Message: I dont feel like training today, I am sorry.

It's alright to have off days, but remember, every effort brings you closer to your goals. Take a breather now, and we can pick up where we left off tomorrow with renewed energy. I'll be here for you when the time comes.
I am so busy today, I dont have any time today and I have not eaten breakfast yet.

Your well-being matters too. Perhaps pushing physical training to later in the day or rescheduling might help. Don't forget to take care of essential needs first. We can adapt to find the best fit for you.
I lost my training shoes yesterday and all clothing stores are closed today, so I cant buy new ones.

Setbacks happen, but don't let them discourage you. We can work around this temporarily, focusing more on bodyweight exercises or finding alternatives until you get new gear. Let's make the most of the situation and keep moving forward together.
